imdb.plot outline: Helping everyday people remember their true powers as human beings, live an awakened life, find their brightest light and shine it upon others for a more fulfilling earth experience and the chance to make a positive global impact. Michael amalgamates his experience living on six continents, his spiritual journey through a myriad of cosmic practices and ancient philosophies, and his inner knowing from doing the deep work to liberate himself from the allure of the material world to leave everything and take up his planetary purpose, into profound yet simple advice, which you can grab while they are waiting in line for coffee and then apply the same day. He challenges belief systems in a heart-centered way and taps on your door of inner knowing. This wisdom can lead to more happiness, personal growth, charging of the body, mind and soul, a lighting up of your earth mission, and how to become the heroes of your lives.
imdb.title: On Purpose
plot: Helping everyday people remember their true powers as human beings, live an awakened life, find their brightest light and shine it upon others for a more fulfilling earth experience and the chance to make a positive global impact. Michael amalgamates his experience living on six continents, his spiritual journey through a myriad of cosmic practices and ancient philosophies, and his inner knowing from doing the deep work to liberate himself from the allure of the material world to leave everything and take up his planetary purpose, into profound yet simple advice, which you can grab while they are waiting in line for coffee and then apply the same day. He challenges belief systems in a heart-centered way and taps on your door of inner knowing. This wisdom can lead to more happiness, personal growth, charging of the body, mind and soul, a lighting up of your earth mission, and how to become the heroes of your lives.
